check.title: PHP lint problems
check.description: This section shows php lint problems in the code detected by php -l

check.description: This section shows the coding style problems detected in the code by phpcs

check.title: Commit messages problems
check.description: This section shows the problems detected in the commit messages by the commits checker

check.title: Update savepoints problems

check.title: Third party library modification problems

check.title: grunt changes
